snippet.title: DeLight: The Journey Home - Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1278880/DeLight/

Pre-register on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.wexgames.delightgp

Pre-order on App Store: https://apps.apple.com/my/app/delight-the-journey-home/id1526425730 

DeLight is a storytelling adventure game about a blind girl, a stray dog, and their unexpected journey during wartime.

Official website: https://www.dreamtreegames.com/delight
Follow DreamTree Games on Twitter: https://twitter.com/DreamTreeGames
Like DeLight on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playdelight
Like DreamTree Games on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/dreamtreegames
DeLight on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1278880/DeLight/
